page.title: 17Law and Order - Dog Training
page.content:
Location: Home Farm House (listed building) Harborne.
Tucked away in an old converted farm building is the West Midlands Police Dog Training Centre. This is of considerable importance since it is responsible for the training of all police dogs in the West Midlands area which extends as far as Staffordshire Warwickshire & West Mercia. The Centre not only trains between 15 & 20 young dogs each year but also provides regular refresher courses for all dogs that are already working in the force. The dogs (Alsations) are mainly trained for general day to day police work but a steadily increasing number are trained for more specialist work ie. drug detection, arms & explosive work & location of buried bodies.
